title: CFTRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Associate Posts
description: The Central Food Technological Research Institute (CFTRI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, M.E./M. Tech in Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering can apply for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the...
